藉.definition: (literary) cushion; mat; (literary) to put some padding underneath

藉口.definition: to use as an excuse; on the pretext; excuse; pretext; also written 借口[jie4 kou3]

藉此.definition: using this as a pretext; thereby

藉著.definition: by means of; through; with the help of

藉詞推搪.definition: to make a lot of excuses
